<<<<<<< HEAD Ocjp on Kresna Note on Software Development http://note.kresna.xyz/tags/ocjp/ Recent content in Ocjp on Kresna Note on Software Development Hugo -- gohugo.io en-us freddy@kresna.xyz (Freddy K Tjoenedi) freddy@kresna.xyz (Freddy K Tjoenedi) Kresna.xyz Thu, 17 Nov 2016 13:41:03 +0700 ======= Kresna Note on Software Development http://note.kresna.xyz/tags/ocjp/index.xml Recent content on Kresna Note on Software Development Hugo -- gohugo.io en-us Kresna.xyz >>>>>>> 0822e7388aae10b4bb4e2fd29d471ef45e9da9cf Inner Class http://note.kresna.xyz/java/inner-class/ Thu, 17 Nov 2016 13:41:03 +0700 <<<<<<< HEAD freddy@kresna.xyz (Freddy K Tjoenedi) http://note.kresna.xyz/java/inner-class/ Regular Inner Class class ClassA{ private String text = "Some string"; class ClassB{ public void methodA() { System.out.println("MethodA"); } } } Static Inner Class class ClassA1{ static class ClassB { void methodB() { System.out.println("methodB"); } } } class ClassC { static class ClassD { void methodD() { System.out.println("methodD"); } } public static void main(String[] args) { ClassA1.ClassB ab = new ClassA1.ClassB(); ab.methodB(); ClassD classD = new ClassD(); classD.methodD(); } } Method-local Inner Class Anonymous Inner Class ======= http://note.kresna.xyz/java/inner-class/

Regular Inner Class

class ClassA{
  private String text = "Some string";

  class ClassB{
    public void methodA() {
      System.out.println("MethodA");
    }
  }
}

Static Inner Class

class ClassA1{
  static class ClassB {
    void methodB() {
      System.out.println("methodB");
    }
  }
}

class ClassC {
  static class ClassD {
    void methodD() {
      System.out.println("methodD");
    }
  }
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    ClassA1.ClassB ab = new ClassA1.ClassB();
    ab.methodB();

    ClassD classD = new ClassD();
    classD.methodD();
  }
}

Method-local Inner Class

Anonymous Inner Class
